Description: Implemented complete booking extension service (ExtensionRequestService.ts) with calculation logic, conflict detection, automatic box reassignment for conflicting bookings, extension tracking fields, and transaction management.
Created REST API endpoints for booking extensions (/api/bookings/[bookingId]/extend) with GET (pre-calculation) and POST (request extension) methods, payment intent creation, and validation.
Developed ExtendBookingModal.tsx React component with date/time selection, real-time cost calculation, validation, error handling, and payment flow integration.
Implemented LocationPricingService.ts for dynamic location-based pricing per week, including create, read, update operations, week calculation logic, and pricing retrieval.
Created API routes for location pricing management (/api/distributor/admin/pricing) with CRUD operations, validation, and error handling.
Updated Prisma schema to support extension tracking (original_end_date, extension_count, last_extended_at) and location pricing table.
Enhanced PaymentProcessingService.ts to support extension payments, metadata handling, and payment intent creation for extensions.
Built comprehensive locations management interface in AdminSection.tsx with create, edit, delete operations, image upload functionality, status management, and location listing.
Implemented API routes for locations CRUD operations (/api/distributor/admin/locations) including image upload endpoint with Supabase storage integration.
Developed stands management interface with capacity management, location association, box count tracking, and CRUD operations.
Created API endpoints for stands management (/api/distributor/admin/stands) with validation and relationship handling.
Implemented boxes management interface with model selection, status management, compartment assignment, stand association, and inventory tracking.
Built API routes for boxes CRUD operations (/api/distributor/admin/boxes) with validation and status updates.
Refactored BookingStatusService.ts for better code organization, added batch status updates, and improved status calculation logic.

Implemented comprehensive DashboardStatisticsService.ts (1,370+ lines) with active stands tracking, monthly rental statistics, earnings overview, contract status, box inventory management, booking inventory, stands overview, and locations overview.
Created multiple dashboard API endpoints including stats (/api/distributor/dashboard/stats), inventory (/api/distributor/dashboard/inventory), and stands overview (/api/distributor/dashboard/stands).
Developed DashboardSection.tsx (1,232+ lines) with statistics cards, charts, inventory tables, stands overview, revenue tracking, and real-time data updates.
Implemented RentalStatisticsService.ts (547+ lines) for booking analytics, revenue calculations, occupancy rates, and performance metrics.
Created PerformanceComparisonService.ts (211+ lines) for comparing performance metrics across different time periods and locations.
Developed comprehensive BookingsSection.tsx (534+ lines) with booking list, filtering, status management, extension functionality, return box feature, and booking details modal.
Implemented PaymentsSection.tsx (207+ lines) with payment history, transaction details, invoice generation, and payment status tracking.
Created ProfileSection.tsx (88+ lines) with user profile management, account settings, and personal information updates.
Built NotificationsSection.tsx (58+ lines) for displaying user notifications, marking as read, and notification management.
Implemented SettingsSection.tsx (175+ lines) with user preferences, notification settings, and account configuration.
Developed DashboardSection.tsx (370+ lines) with overview statistics, recent bookings, quick actions, and summary cards.
Enhanced customer API routes (/api/customer/bookings, /api/customer/notifications) with improved filtering, pagination, and data formatting.
Implemented BoxInventoryService.ts (485+ lines) for comprehensive box inventory management, status tracking, location management, and availability calculations.
Created inventory API endpoints (/api/distributor/inventory) with box status updates, location changes, and inventory queries.
Developed DistributorBookingService.ts (332+ lines) for managing bookings from distributor perspective, booking reassignment, status updates, and booking queries.
Implemented DistributorFinancialService.ts (205+ lines) for revenue tracking, payment processing, financial reporting, and transaction management.
Created DistributorNotificationService.ts (283+ lines) for sending notifications to distributors, booking alerts, system notifications, and email integration.
Built ContractService.ts (177+ lines) for contract management, status tracking, expiration handling, and contract queries.
Implemented contract API endpoints (/api/distributor/contracts) with CRUD operations and status management.
Implemented PromotionService.ts (275+ lines) for managing promotions, discount codes, promotional pricing, and marketing campaigns.
Created promotions API endpoints (/api/distributor/promotions) with CRUD operations and validation.
Developed ExportService.ts (243+ lines) for exporting booking data, financial reports, inventory reports, and CSV/Excel generation.
Implemented export API endpoint (/api/distributor/export) with multiple export formats and filtering options.
Created statistics API endpoint (/api/distributor/statistics) for performance metrics, revenue analytics, and booking statistics.
Built StandService.ts (247+ lines) for stand management, capacity calculations, box assignments, and stand queries.
Enhanced BookingValidationService.ts with improved date validation, conflict detection, and booking rules enforcement.
Updated BookingAvailabilityService.ts with improved availability calculations and conflict resolution.
Created BoxScoreUtils.ts (85+ lines) for calculating box scores, availability scoring, and optimization algorithms.
Enhanced payment success page (/app/payment/success/page.tsx) with improved UI, extension payment handling, and success confirmation.
Updated payment processing routes (/api/payments/[paymentIntentId]/route.ts) with improved error handling, extension payment support, and transaction logging.
Significantly enhanced BookingsPageClient.tsx (846+ lines) with improved booking management, filtering, search functionality, and UI improvements.
Refactored LocationDetails.tsx (1,136+ lines reduced) for better performance, improved code organization, and enhanced user experience.
Created BookingDetailsSummary.tsx (155+ lines) for displaying comprehensive booking information in a structured format.
Developed PriceBreakdown.tsx (95+ lines) for displaying detailed pricing information, fees, and cost calculations.
Enhanced googlemap.tsx with improved scrolling, marker management, and location display.
Implemented booking status sync endpoint (/api/distributor/bookings/sync-statuses) for batch status updates.
Total Hours: 210 hours across 2 monthly invoices (December 2025: 120 hours, January 2026: 90 hours)
